pizzas.name: BBQ Burnt Ends
pizzas.description: Slow-cooked beef brisket with a hint of chipotle, sweet & smoky bbq sauce, mozzarella and red onions, topped with roasted tomatoes and parsley on a Romana base.
ingredients: beef, chipotle, bbq sauce, mozarella, red onions, tomatoes

pizzas.name: La Reine
pizzas.description: Ham, black olives, mushrooms, mozzarella and tomato on a Romana base.
ingredients: ham, black olives, mushrooms, mozarella, tomato

pizzas.name: Margherita
pizzas.description: Mozzarella and tomato on a Romana base. Vegan option available.

pizzas.name: Padana
pizzas.description: Goat’s cheese, mozzarella, caramelised onion, spinach, red onion, tomato and garlic oil on a Romana base.
ingredients: goats'cheese, mozzarella, onion (caramelised), spinach, red onion, tomato

pizzas.name: Pepperoni
pizzas.description: Pepperoni, mozzarella and tomato, with your choice of hot green, hot & sweet chilli or jalapeño peppers on a Romana base.
ingredients: pepperoni, mozzarella, tomato, hot green peppers, hot peppers, sweet chilli, jalapeño peppers

pizzas.name: Pollo Italiano
pizzas.description: Chicken, spinach, mozzarella and garlic oil on a béchamel base, topped with slow-roasted tomatoes, basil & pine kernel pesto and Gran Milano cheese on a Romana base.​
ingredients: chicken, spinach, mozzarella, garlic oil, béchamel, tomatoes, basil, pine kernel pesto, Gran Milano Cheese

pizzas.name: Sloppy Vegan Romana
pizzas.description: Green pepper, red onion, tomato, smoky chilli, garlic oil, vegan mozzarella alternative and parsley on a Romana base.
ingredients: green pepper, red onion, tomato, smoky chilli, garlic oil, vegan mozzarella, parsley

pizzas.name: Vegan Giardiniera
pizzas.description: Artichoke, mushrooms, red onion and black olives, with tomato, vegan mozzarella alternative, garlic oil and parsley on a Romana base.
ingredients: artichoke, mushrooms, red onion, black olives, tomato, vegan mozzarella, garlioc oil, parsley

pizzas.name: Veneziana
pizzas.description: Pine kernels, red onion, capers, black olives, sultanas, mozzarella and tomato on a Romana base (pictured). Vegan option available.
ingredients: pine kernels, red onion, capers, black olives, sultanas, mozzarella, tomato
